content:
Hello,

I was wondering how to determine the breakdown of a score on a pset. For the last pset, I mistakenly missed the halfway hand-in, so I was wondering how that would impact the overal score of that pset. Furthermore, I saw that I recieved a 96% for pset 3, but received full credit for the check off and the halfway hand in, so I'm not sure how to account for what the overall pset score would be. Is the percentage on the site an accurate way to check my overall standing pset-wise, because it seems quite low (although this could be because I have yet to submit pset 5).

Any guidance would be appreciated. Thank you!
subject: Pset breakdown

content: The halfway handin is worth 10%, the autograder is worth about 65% and the checkoff about 25%. For pset3, your autograder part is 96% and everything else is 100%..

Thanks for the response! I'm currently a little confused about my pset average; it says on the site that its 85%, but I'm not sure how that average was reached. As far as I'm aware, the only pset which received a score in the B range was pset 4; is that incorrect? Since my other psets were 100 percents or very close, I am a bit confused. Thanks in advance!

Oh sorry, just realized the actual pset grade for 5 hasn't been released, just the checkoff. End of semester is getting to me! Thanks regardless, and wanted to let you know I really enjoyed your class!
The pset5 score has not been counted yet -- when you see the score for pset5 on the site then the final avg will also update.
